Haven't played much on this account, I started playing this game close to when it first came out and never understood it... After a few years I tried again and fell in love with the game. Brilliant story line, gameplay and graphics.

Believe what you hear about portal, it really is  worth the money. the gameplay is smooth, the story is compelling and the puzzles are challenging. the only thing I would change about this game, is (SPOILER ALERT. DON'T READ PAST THIS IF YOU WANT THE FULL EXPERIENCE.)







The boss fight with glados, which I think could be a bit harder
Yeah, I'm incredibly late, but I finally bought this game and the sequel for $1.48! It's already worth the money, and I haven't even played the sequel yet.
great game beat it multiple times
este juego es una maravilla y la historia aun mejor, puede que sea corto pero vale totalmente la pena su compra y el jugarlo

Previously I only played portal 2 and picked this up on sale to see what all the hype is about. For the same price I see portal 2 as a better game, but this is appealing in its own way as well. I'd say it's worth the money, but portal 2 is a better value if you're debating between the two.
Fun puzzles, not too long. Good stuff.
Great game, was fun. Clark dreed
uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado
by far one of if not the best puzzle games i have ever played, it has aged spectacularly
